attributes.title: Horrible design
attributes.review: This app is a horrible design. It is glitchy and drains my battery. You may as well not bother.

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: I cannot believe I even downloaded this app. Even touching the words “Donald Trump” disgusted me. I feel sick now. Deleted in seconds.

attributes.title: please ✨s t o p✨
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and immediately there were cockroaches on my bed! 100% DON’T recommend unless you want foot fungi.

attributes.title: I wish I can give it a 0
attributes.review: Yooo it’s so glitchy that I couldn’t play my anime openings it also exploded my dinosaur chicken nuggets this app is useless like Sakura uchiha

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this is a horrible app. Disgusting, definitely should be deleted. Glitches, no games, nothing! Takes forever and I have the best WiFi. WE ARE GETTING THIS APP DELETED. GEN Z FOR THE WIN

attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: I wanted to see what’s going on with out president but this app is just terrible and unhelpful AT ALL it’s sooo slow and glitch jeez make an update alr

attributes.title: scarred for life
attributes.review: I open the app to find... a Cheeto puff with some white dandruff on its head? Wouldn't recommend, I'd rather see the original cheeto puff. False advertising 😔

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is fake. Trump supporters should go download the Team Joe app buy all ur gear there this app is fake and trying to steal all our hard earned dollars.
